description:
When a column is empty, show context-aware suggestions like 'Add your first task here' with visual arrows pointing to the add button. Include column-specific hints (e.g., 'Drag completed items here' for Done column).

**Rationale:** Empty columns create confusion about workflow. Smart prompts teach users how to use each section effectively and maintain momentum in their task management.
title: Contextual Empty Column Prompts
